summary.span: 表示可显示超链接的 Windows 标签控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows label control that can display hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将替换功能并将其添加到 和 控件。The control replaces and adds functionality to the and controls. 但是，如果您选择，则会保留 和 控件以实现向后兼容性和将来使用。However, the and controls are retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 控件类似于 控件，但它可以显示超链接。The control is similar to a control with the exception that it can display a hyperlink. 可以在控件的文本中指定多个超链接。Multiple hyperlinks can be specified in the text of the control. 每个超链接都可以在应用程序中执行不同的任务。Each hyperlink can perform a different task within an application. 例如，可以使用超链接在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中显示网站，或加载与应用程序关联的日志文件。For example, you can use a hyperlink to display a Web site in Microsoft Internet Explorer or to load a log file associated with an application. 控件中显示的每个超链接都是 类的实例。Each hyperlink displayed in the control is an instance of the class. 类定义了超链接的显示信息、状态和位置。The class defines display information, state, and location of the hyperlink. 此外， 类的 属性使你能够将信息（如显示的 URL）与超链接关联起来。In addition, the property of the class enables you to associate information, such as a URL to display, with the hyperlink. 当用户单击控件中的超链接时，将引发 事件，表示所单击的超链接的 对象将作为作为参数传递给事件处理程序的 对象的一部分传递。When a user clicks a hyperlink within the control, the event is raised, and the object representing the hyperlink that was clicked is passed as part of the object that is passed as a parameter to the event handler. 您可以使用此对象获取与用户单击的超链接关联的 对象。You can use this object to obtain the object associated with the hyperlink that was clicked by the user. 控件中包含的所有超链接都存储在该控件的 类实例中。All hyperlinks contained within the control are stored in the class instance for the control. 可通过两种方法将超链接添加到 控件。There are two ways to add a hyperlink to the control. 最快的方法是指定 并将其分配给 属性。The quickest way is to specify a and assign it to the property. 这使您可以在控件的文本中指定单个超链接。This enables you to specify a single hyperlink within the text of the control. 若要添加多个超链接，可以通过 属性访问集合来使用 类的 方法。To add multiple hyperlinks, you can use the method of the class by accessing the collection through the property. 创建 控件时，会将包含 控件中所有文本的默认超链接添加到 中。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 您可以通过使用 属性指定新的链接区域，或使用 的 方法指定链接来覆盖此默认链接。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 还可以通过使用 类的 方法来删除默认超链接。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. 默认情况下，将 `true` 属性，前提是 集合中至少有一个大于零的链接。The property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the collection. 控件具有单个 值。The control has a single value. 但是，大于零的每个链接都将按从左到右的顺序获取其自己的制表位。However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order. 若要阻止导航到 控件的 tab 键导航，请将 属性设置为 "`false`"。To prevent tab navigation to the control, set the property to `false`. 但请注意，将新链接添加到 集合会自动将 属性设置为 "`true`"。However, be aware that adding new links to the collection will automatically set the property to `true` again. 提供了许多属性，使用这些属性可以定义控件中的超链接的显示外观。The provides a number of properties that enable you to define the display appearance of hyperlinks in the control. 、、和 属性定义了在不同状态下显示超链接时使用的颜色。The , , , and properties define the colors used when displaying a hyperlink in various states. 属性定义与超链接关联的下划线的显示方式。The property defines the display of the underline that is associated with a hyperlink. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example demonstrates using the class. 该示例通过打开网站来处理 事件。The example handles the event by opening a Web site. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/CS/form.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/VB/form.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color to display an active link.

value.span: 默认颜色由系统指定，通常，此颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动链接是正在被单击的链接。An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked. 这类似于按下 控件的状态。This is similar to the depressed state of a control. 使用此属性可以指定在链接处于单击过程中时显示链接的颜色。You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked. 有许多与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 指定 控件中显示的所有链接的颜色。The specifies the color of all links displayed in the control. 利用 属性，您可以指定链接被用户访问后的链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. 禁用链接时，将使用 显示处于禁用状态的链接。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保将属性设置为的颜色不会与控件的背景颜色冲突，否则文本将不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控件的背景色是 `Color.Red` 的，并且此属性设置为 `Color.Red`，则在单击该链接时，文本将不会正确显示。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 枚举设置 属性。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它还演示如何设置 、 和 属性。It also demonstrates setting the , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到空白窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeLinkLabel`。To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够指定 中禁用的链接的颜色。This property enables you to specify the color for links that are disabled in the . 禁用的链接不会引发 事件。Disabled links do not cause the event to be raised. 有许多与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 中的所有链接最初均以 属性中定义的颜色显示。All links in the are initially displayed with the color defined in the property. 利用 属性，您可以指定链接在被单击的过程中的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 利用 属性，您可以指定链接被用户访问后的链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保将属性设置为的颜色不会与控件的背景颜色冲突，否则文本将不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控件的背景色是 `Color.Red` 的，并且此属性设置为 `Color.Red`，则在禁用该链接时，文本不会正确显示。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is disabled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种快速方法来指定要在 控件的文本中显示的单个超链接。The property provides a quick way to specify a single hyperlink to display in the text of the control. 对象提供属性，这些属性指定链接文本中链接的起始位置和超链接的文本长度。The object provides properties that specify the starting position of the link within the text of the control and the length of text for the hyperlink. 当使用 属性指定超链接时，该超链接将添加到控件的 中。When a hyperlink is specified using the property, the hyperlink is added to the of the control. 属性将分配给它的 对象转换为存储在集合中的 对象。The property converts the object assigned to it to a object that is stored within the collection. 若要将多个超链接添加到控件文本，可以使用 属性。To add multiple hyperlinks to the text of the control, you can use the property. 属性使你能够访问 的属性和方法，该属性和方法存储为控件指定的链接。The property enables you to access the properties and methods of the , which stores the links specified for the control. 这种将链接添加到 的方法还使您能够在 属性中指定与正在创建的链接关联的数据。This method of adding links to the also enables you to specify data in the property that is associated with the link being created. 属性的值可用于存储要显示的文件的位置或网站的地址。The value of the property can be used to store the location of a file to display or the address of a Web site. 创建 控件时，会将包含 控件中所有文本的默认超链接添加到 中。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 您可以通过使用 属性指定新的链接区域，或使用 的 方法指定链接来覆盖此默认链接。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 还可以通过使用 类的 方法来删除默认超链接。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. > [!NOTE] > 无论将超链接添加到集合中的方式如何， 属性始终返回 中的第一项。The property always returns the first item in the , regardless of how the hyperlink was added to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用 ，并且 属性包含双字节字符，则 上的 属性将有所不同。The property on will differ if you call , and the property contains double-byte characters. 如果调用 ，它将返回字符串中的字节数。If you call , it will return the number of bytes in the string. 否则，它将返回实际字符数。Otherwise, it will return the number of actual characters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您可以在链接显示在控件中时指定链接的行为。This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control. 例如，如果希望仅当鼠标指针位于某一链接上时才显示带下划线的链接，则可以将此属性设置为 `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`. 有关可与链接关联的行为类型的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. summary.span: 当单击控件内的链接时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a link is clicked within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，当用户单击控件中的链接时，将处理 事件以执行任务。Typically, the event is handled to perform tasks when the user clicks on a link in the control. 向 事件的事件处理程序传递 类的实例，该实例包含与已单击的链接关联的 对象。The event handler for the event is passed an instance of the class that contains a object that is associated with the link that was clicked. 您可以使用 类的 属性中指定的信息确定单击了哪个链接或单击链接时要执行的任务类型。You can use information specified in the property of class to determine which link was clicked or what type of task to perform when the link is clicked. 例如，如果 控件具有一个定义了其 属性设置为字符串 `www.microsoft.com`的 对象，则可以在 事件的事件处理程序中使用此信息来显示网站。For example, if a control has a object defined with its property set to the string `www.microsoft.com`, you can use this information in an event handler for the event to display the Web site. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example demonstrates using the class. 该示例通过打开网站来处理 事件。The example handles the event by opening a Web site. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/CS/form.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelSimple/VB/form.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. summary.span: 获取或设置显示普通链接时使用的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a normal link.

value.span: ，表示用来显示普通链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to displaying a normal link.

value.span: 默认颜色由系统指定，通常，此颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够指定最初为 中的所有链接显示的颜色。This property enables you to specify the color that is initially displayed for all links in the . 有许多与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 利用 属性，您可以指定链接在被单击的过程中的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 利用 属性，您可以指定链接被用户访问后的链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. 禁用链接时，将使用 显示处于禁用状态的链接。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保将属性设置为的颜色不会与控件的背景颜色冲突，否则文本将不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控件的背景色是 `Color.Red` 的，并且此属性设置为 `Color.Red`，则链接的文本将不会正确显示。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text of the link is not shown properly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以在控件的文本中显示任意数量的链接。A control can display any number of links within the text of the control. 此属性使你能够访问与 关联的 实例，该实例表示控件中显示的链接的集合。This property enables you to access the instance associated with the that represents the collection of links displayed in the control. 然后，可以使用 类的成员在集合中添加、删除和查找链接。You can then use the members of the class to add, remove, and find links in the collection. 有关可通过链接集合执行的任务类型的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on the types of tasks you can perform with the link collection, see . 创建 控件时，会将包含 控件中所有文本的默认超链接添加到 中。When a control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the control is added to the . 您可以通过使用 属性指定新的链接区域，或使用 的 方法指定链接来覆盖此默认链接。You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the property, or specify a link using the method of the . 还可以通过使用 类的 方法来删除默认超链接。You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the method of the class. 如果不需要指定多个要在 中显示的链接，则可以使用 属性。If you do not need to specify more than one link to display within the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链接是否应显示为如同被访问过的链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.

value.span: 如果链接应显示为如同被访问过，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不会自动表示链接是已访问的链接。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要将链接显示为已访问链接，可以将此属性的值设置为在 的 事件的事件处理程序中 `true`。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the event of a . 使用 控件的 属性中指定的颜色显示已访问的链接。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. 当包含 控件的窗体关闭后，将删除与链接关联的 "所有显示" 状态。Once the form containing the control is closed, the "all display" state associated with the link is deleted. 为了保留链接的显示状态，需要将链接的显示状态存储在与应用程序关联的注册表设置中。In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅影响 控件中定义的第一个链接。This property only affects the first link defined in the control. 如果在控件中指定了多个链接，请使用 类的 属性。If you have more than one link specified in the control, use the property of the class. 您可以使用 属性访问在 中定义的所有链接。You can access all the links defined in the by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 枚举设置 属性。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它还演示如何设置 、 和 属性。It also demonstrates setting the , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到空白窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeLinkLabel`。To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您可以确定链接是否位于 控件中的特定点。This method enables you to determine whether a link is located at a specific point within a control. 您可以在事件处理程序中将此方法用于控件的 事件，以确定鼠标指针是否悬停在控件中的某个链接上。You can use this method in an event handler for the event of the control to determine whether the mouse pointer is hovering over a link in the control. 确定鼠标指针位于链接上后，可以通过 文本或 显示有关用户的链接的其他信息。Once you have determined that the mouse pointer is over a link, you can then display additional information about the link to the user through text or a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在消息处理过程中调用，以处理对话框字符，如选项卡、返回、转义和箭头键。This method is called during message pre-processing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 仅当 `isInputKey` 方法指示控件对键不感兴趣时，才调用此方法。This method is called only if the `isInputKey` method indicates that the control isn't interested in the key. `processDialogKey` 只是将字符发送到父级的 `processDialogKey` 方法，或者，如果控件没有父级，则返回 false。`processDialogKey` simply sends the character to the parent's `processDialogKey` method, or returns false if the control has no parent. `Form` 类将重写此方法以执行对话框键的实际处理。The `Form` class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys. 重写 `processDialogKey`时，控件应返回 `true`，以指示它已处理该键。When overriding `processDialogKey`, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the key. 对于不是由控件处理的键，应返回 `base.processDialogChar` 的结果。For keys that aren't processed by the control, the result of `base.processDialogChar` should be returned. 控件很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，将 `true` 属性，前提是 集合中至少有一个大于零的链接。The property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the collection. 控件具有单个 值。The control has a single value. 但是，大于零的每个链接都将按从左到右的顺序获取其自己的制表位。However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order. 若要阻止导航到 控件的 tab 键导航，请将 属性设置为 "`false`"。To prevent tab navigation to the control, set the property to `false`. 但请注意，将新链接添加到 集合会自动将 属性设置为 "`true`"。However, be aware that adding new links to the collection will automatically set the property to `true` again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `LinkLabel1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `LinkLabel1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 是否应使用 类来执行文本呈现，以便与版本1.0 和1.1 兼容。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.

value.span: .NET Framework 的;否则，。

span.span: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则 覆盖整个文本。If the property is set to `false`, the covers the entire text. 例如，"abcd" 等文本在呈现时尾随空格带有下划线。For example, text such as "abcd " is rendered with the trailing space underlined. 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 不包含整个文本。If the property is set to `true`, the does not cover the entire text. `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 属性旨在提供 Windows 窗体控件之间的视觉兼容性，这些控件使用 类呈现文本，并使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] 类 [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] 和 执行自定义文本呈现的应用程序。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不是从 [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]升级，则建议你将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 设置为默认值 "`false`"。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 中引入了基于 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 的 类以提高性能，使文本更好地显示，并改善对国际字体的支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的早期版本中，将使用基于 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 的 类来执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算不同于 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]的字符间距和自动换行。calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在使用 类呈现文本的 Windows 窗体应用程序中，这可能会导致使用 的控件的文本与应用程序中的其他文本显示不相同。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决这种不兼容性问题，可将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 属性设置为特定控件 `true`。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 设置为应用程序中所有支持的控件 `true`，请使用 `true`的参数调用 方法。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

value.span: 默认颜色由系统指定，通常，此颜色为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于指定为用户访问的 `LinkLabel` 中的所有链接显示的颜色。This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the `LinkLabel` that have been visited by the user. 有许多与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 中的所有链接最初均以 属性中定义的颜色显示。All links in the are initially displayed with the color defined in the property. 利用 属性，您可以指定链接在被单击的过程中的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked. 禁用链接时，将使用 显示处于禁用状态的链接。When a link is disabled, the is used to display the link in a disabled state. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保将属性设置为的颜色不会与控件的背景颜色冲突，否则文本将不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控件的背景色是 `Color.Red` 的，并且此属性设置为 `Color.Red`，则当链接显示为已访问链接时，文本将不会正确显示。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links.
